items.sentence: I've been looking forward to hearing from you for weeks.
If you're not going to the concert, then I'm not either.
Tom stopped kissing Mary when he heard the door opening.
I can't believe Tom got angry about something like that.
Tom is tone-deaf, so he rarely sings in front of others.
I haven't told you about what Tom did last week, have I?
Your posture makes you look shorter than you really are.
Tom and Mary had a couple of drinks together at the bar.
Tom has been married to Mary for more than thirty years.
Tom is planning something special for just him and Mary.
